PerfectNetExp.abs: 近似字词-新浪字典 ... inodorous 无臭的 inoffensively 无害地 inogen 肌收缩原.

list.abs: a quiet inoffensive man ; a refreshing inoffensive stimulant ., 一个彬彬有礼的人 ; 能提神而无害的兴奋剂.
inoffensive是什么意思... ... inoffensive 的英语解释： inoffensive passage 无害通过 inoffensive navigation 【法】 无害航行.
he never killed an inoffensive animal .他从不打死一只无害的野兽。
morally respectable or inoffensive ., 道德上值得尊敬的或不冒犯别人的.

means.word_mean: 1. in a not unpleasantly offensive manner;

sentences.sentence: "that wretched beast, the elephant, breathing inoffensively not a pace behind me"
